Public Remarks: Immaculately maintained horse property on 8+ acres in Victor with multiple outbuildings, no CCRs & development potential. This home's meticulous owners have upgraded every window, roof, door, floor, countertop, appliance & wood stove and added an office (potential 3rd bedroom) & covered porch- creating a great outdoor kitchen. Boasting a huge 54 x 36 barn with hay & tractor storage, 2 stalls, a cedar lined tack room, 3 turn out sheds, a sandy arena & other bully barns. The oversized 32x 32 heated garage/shop has built-in workbenches & 2nd story storage. Irrigation water rights, a drip system to the perimeter landscaping, steel & electric fencing (new posts in 2019) seal the deal. Come check out this move-in ready horse property!
Private Remarks: 3rd bedroom/office does not have a closet or a true door but both could be added.     Main home is manufactured (1997) and has not been moved since being placed on a foundation.

Public Remarks: Located in the Teton Reserve project, this 1664 SqFt home offers 3 bedrooms and 2.5 baths with a modern, open concept kitchen and living area. The dedicated dining area leads to a covered rear patio. The main floor master suite includes a walk-in closet and spacious bath with dual sinks and a subway tile shower. This efficient ''Wister'' floorplan is unique with a half bath for guests, dedicated laundry and a mudroom off of the garage. The two guest baths on the main floor are separated from the living areas of the home and feature a guest bath with tub/shower and a tile surround. In addition to this open yet efficient living space, the home features a huge unfinished basement with room for an additional 2-3 bedrooms, a media room and another full bath. The listed HOA dues include water.

Public Remarks: Escape conventional neighborhood living to this 8.5 acre horse property offering amazing views from the base of Pine Creek Pass. Quick access to Drake Creek, Grove Creek, Patterson Creek and many other nearby trailheads in the Big Holes allow you to ride- horseback, mountain bike, dirt bike or hike- from your property. 7+ garage bays and tons of heated semi-finished space provide endless opportunities for this barn-style home. Elevated living quarters & 3 balconies capture the surrounding mountain views, while a very private back yard, with a seasonal creek, is the perfect spot to relax or entertain friends after a day playing in the mountains.

Ground floor has a 3rd bed/bath, multiple offices, storage rooms & another 1/2 bath. 2nd floor has a 4th bedroom, balcony, office and lot's of storage.

Public Remarks: Rare Victor Offering- this sunny residence on over 8 pastoral acres will steal your heart! This custom home in a great location- tucked up in the Fox Creek foothills- has timeless high quality finishes throughout. Featuring skip-sawn hickory floors, granite & marble tops, upgraded plumbing fixtures, custom alder and barn wood cabinetry & an efficient wood fireplace insert. Boasting a huge 40 x 36 shop with 10 ft auto doors set up for a future apartment above, this property has potential to grow. A perfect ranch-ette for horses; the paddocks are cross fenced & irrigated; mesh fencing around the interior keeps the dogs in, PLUS a barn with loafing area, hay storage, water & electric. Relaxed CCRs (only 5 lots total) & 40 minutes to Jackson Hole. Come check out all this property has to offer!

Hand lines, stand alone dog fencing and corral panels are negotiable. Shop is rough plumbed for in-floor hydronic heat in concrete and could connect to the existing septic tank which is 1000 gallons.

Public Remarks: One of the larger homes in Brookside Hollow, this 5 bedroom, 3 bath home sits on a corner lot. Immaculate from the hardwood floors to the vaulted ceiling and extremely well maintained, this home is ''Move in Ready''. Gas cooktop, stainless steel appliances and granite countertops in kitchen. Jetted tub and separate, large shower in the master bath. Gas fireplace in living room. Radon Mitigation System installed. Large back yard with 2 storage sheds, gazebo and 1,000 gal. buried propane tank (leased). Located in city limits of Victor and also within walking distance to downtown Victor. Short term rentals are allowed. Brookside Hollow is very kid friendly and the streets even close down one night a year, exclusively for trick or treating on Halloween. OPEN HOUSE April 17 from 11:00am-3:00pm.

Public Remarks: Contemporary and efficient home or future guest house with 2 beds/2 baths +loft on 2.5 irrigated acres with fenced pasture and no CCRs. Thoughtfully built with hydronic in-floor heat, beautiful stained concrete floors, a cozy wood-burning stove and 3 garage bays. Upstairs main living area and 2 elevated decks of this home take advantage of the mountain views up Fox Creek Canyon. Expand the living space in the downstairs garage portion of the home (there is already plumbing and a bathroom, in floor heat) or build guest  house down the line. In-ground sprinkler system runs off irrigation water (with deeded water rights) or culinary well. No HOA dues, your own well & septic mean no monthly bills to the city. Come see what convenient country living in the Fox Creek area of Victor looks like.
Private Remarks: Future guest house would need approval for such should be verified with Teton County Planning & Building departments.    Desks in loft are included. 500 gal propane tank is owned and buried. Garden shed is included. Note 1/2 bath on garage level is a utility sink and separate toilet room. 3rd bay of garage is not heated and gravel floor

Public Remarks: Located in the Teton Reserve project, this 1664 SqFt home offers 3 bedrooms and 2.5 baths with a modern, open concept kitchen and living area. The dedicated dining area leads to a covered rear patio. The main floor master suite includes a walk-in closet and spacious bath with dual sinks and a subway tile shower. This efficient ''Wister'' floorplan is unique with a half bath for guests, dedicated laundry and a mudroom off of the garage. The two guest baths on the main floor are separated from the living areas of the home and feature a guest bath with tub/shower and a tile surround. In addition to this open yet efficient living space, the home features a huge unfinished basement with room for an additional 2-3 bedrooms, a media room and another full bath. The listed HOA dues include water.

Public Remarks: This home in the Teton Reserve community just minutes from Victor, ID offers a stunning and unique setting and includes a covered front and rear patio to welcome and entertain guests. Inside, the main floor offers a modern, open concept layout with extraordinary finishes and cozy gas fireplace. The main floor layout includes access to the private master suite, powder room, and huge laundry + mudroom off the 2 car attached garage. Upstairs you'll find a second living or game room, two large guest bedrooms and guest bath with subway tile shower. Don't forget about the full unfinished basement for future expansion, a great way to add to your home's value! Estimated 2022

Public Remarks: Located on a pond and bordering the executive course at Teton Springs, this Stonecrop model Mountain Meadows home features a ground floor bedroom suite and more than 3,000 sq.ft. of well-appointed living space. The vaulted great room with floor-to-ceiling gas fireplace leads to a sunny deck for morning coffee or for entertaining in the evenings. An open kitchen with generous breakfast bar creates the perfect space to gather with family and friends. Upstairs, the floor plan affords two generous en-suite guest bedrooms and an open loft space for an office or reading nook. Walk to the clubhouse for dinner or to take advantage of the year-round amenities of this four-season resort. The shops and restaurants of the towns of Victor and Driggs are also just a short drive away.

Public Remarks: Superb pride of ownership shows at this 3600 sq ft 4bd/4ba home near Victor, ID.  Offered fully furnished with a great mix of collectable antiques and newer high quality furniture.  The main level has a 2 story rock fireplace in the living room, large kitchen/dining area, and guest bedroom.  The second level offers the master bedroom suite,  2 additional guest bedrooms, and a large loft living area.  The lower level game room has a wood burning stove and a full bath.  The 3.3 acres if fenced for horses, has irrigation water rights, and a 40x30 storage barn,  multiple outdoor living areas, and mature landscaping add to the peaceful setting.  About 1 mile to the Fox Creek forest trailhead for horseback riding, skiing, and hiking.

Public Remarks: Lovely mountain retreat with everything you've dreamed about. Wide open views towards the Mtns.  Yes, there is a view of the Grand. Located at the back of a looped road this home offers amazing privacy. Inside, this fully furnished home is loaded with rustic appeal.  The great room features a stone fireplace and welcomes you out to a wrap around deck.  The kitchen offers a generous island and an abundance of storage.  Behind the kitchen is a thoughtful pantry/mud room with floor to ceiling cabinetry.  If you have to work, the office has custom cabinetry built locally by ''The Rusty Nail''.  The main floor master suite offers double-door access to the back deck.  Downstairs features a great room flanked by two lovely guest rooms, wet bar and walk-out patio that you'll never want to leave.

Public Remarks: Enjoy beautiful Big Hole Mountain views from this spacious new construction home with an open floor-plan, over sized 2 car garage, 5 bedrooms, 3 full bathrooms in the quiet west-side gated community of Paradise Springs. Engineered hardwood floors, custom alder doors and cabinetry add to the appeal. Gas Fireplace, covered porch, ample deck off dining and master bedroom. The 4th main floor bedroom would make an ideal office, 5th bedroom & bonus room above garage has its own bathroom and is plumbed for a kitchen should you want convert the space into a mother in law suite. This enclave is tucked away the crowds and enjoys common space on three sides of the lot, with nearby Forest Access and  is just minutes from the Teton River. Schedule a showing today- paradise in the foothills awaits!

Exposed beams and vaulted ceiling create a bright and open living area with a gas fireplace and floor to ceiling windows. Spacious first-floor master bedroom opens onto the luxurious updated master bathroom featuring a walk-in shower, soaking tub, double vanity, and his and her closets. Additional home features include two guest bedrooms, a new half bathroom with custom tile, an updated mud/laundry room, a large deck overlooking Double Haul Lake,

Public Remarks: Genuinely one of the more unique offerings to come to market in Victor proper recently, this extraordinary home is full of custom detail blended with a warm, inviting atmosphere. Completely re-built in 2010, the home offers rich finishes and quality craftsmanship throughout. Nothing was left untouched as the home was extensively recreated and improved from the ground up including new foundation, framing, electrical, plumbing, HVAC, roof and everything inside. Travertine tile, knotty alder trim and cabinets and granite countertops compliment the beautifully restored original oak hardwood flooring in the living, dining and upstairs bedroom. A massive 1,056 sqft garage/shop was added in 2014. Within walking distance to restaurants, schools and downtown. No CC&R's and no HOA!

Public Remarks: This modern, efficient single-family home will suit a variety of buyer's needs from end users, to investors to second home owners. Need a guest home for your in-laws? Here it is! Located at the base of Teton Pass off the Old Jackson Hwy in Victor, Idaho this thoughtfully-designed home is offered turnkey and allows short-term rentals with no minimum stay. Mountainside Village offers trails and paths throughout the neighborhood for owner's use as well as a pond for summer recreation. Walk or bike into town for a bite or a beer, or Music on Main. START Bus pickup just 1/3 mile away. Direct non-motorized access to public lands from the neighborhood and several other accesses nearby. Just 20+ minutes from Wilson, WY and 30+ to Jackson, WY, Jackson Hole Mountain Resort and Grand Targhee Resort.

Public Remarks: Enjoy the location & picturesque foothill views of the Teton range from this newer, pristine home with oversized 3 car garage.  The bright & modern chef's kitchen boasts a large island and high end appliances.  The wood burning stove provides ambiance and keeps the whole home cozy in the cooler months.  A spacious patio surrounded by sprinkled sod that faces the foothills is a shady place to relax or entertain in the summer months.  The interior living area windows capitalize on a great view of the tops of the Teton peaks & a broad view of the foothills.  The 1 acre lot offers privacy from neighbors & there is a large open space parcel that is part of the subdivision.  The subdivision is surrounded by larger parcels for a rural feeling yet the property is just minutes from Victor & Driggs.

Public Remarks: This quality constructed new home overlooks an abundance of open space at the back of River Meadows and enjoys sunsets over the Big Hole Mountains.  You will appreciate this private setting from the covered back deck and all of the windows in the great room and dining room.  Inside you'll appreciate that this home is all on one level with an open floor plan.  Quality finishes include wide-plank hardwood floorings, granite counter tops, custom cabinets and a thoughtful pantry.  For those who want a convenient propane stove, it has that too!!!  The large master suite features a soaking tub and a walk-in closet.  To support your Teton Valley Lifestyle, this home offers an oversized two-car garage and a mud room/laundry room with storage.  Easy to show, just call listing agent.

Public Remarks: Fantastic value at Willow Creek Ranches in Victor, Idaho. Dont miss this 4 bedroom 2 bath home with an amazing location that cannot be beat! Just 1 mile West of the stoplight in Victor, the home sits on .34 acres with a fenced back yard, raised garden beds, a storage shed, and a beautiful back deck. Boasting vaulted ceilings and updated flooring, this home is perfect as a primary residence or as a rental. The family friendly neighborhood enjoys a convenient location, walking distance to everything Downtown Victor, just 30 minutes to Grand Targhee and Jackson Hole Mountain Resorts. Quick access to all of the wonderful recreational opportunities and amenities Teton Valley has to offer.  Listing Agent is the homeowner.  Open House 6/4 - 10am to 2pm

Split floor plan with the primary suite separated from the guest bedrooms by a spacious great room. A modern kitchen boasts a large island and is open to dining & living area. Neighborhood has paved streets, community mailboxes & a park; just 4 miles from downtown Victor, a short bike ride on the paved bike path to Victor or Driggs. 35 minutes to Grand Targhee Resort. Come see it now!

Public Remarks: Nestled in the heart of Victor, this charming farmhouse is a rare find with over half an acre that is zoned NX: Neighborhood Mixed Use and is situated among huge trees, a large lawn and mature landscaping that is meticulously maintained. The home has a large living room connected to an eat-in kitchen and an en-suite primary bedroom. The back door leads to a large deck perfect for enjoying Teton Valley sunsets and entertaining guests. NX zoning allows various uses and opportunity for further building. Within a very short distance to restaurants, schools and connected to city services. A 35 minute drive gets you to Jackson, Wyoming or Grand Targhee Resort for world-class recreation. Enjoy all that Teton Valley has to offer from this downtown Victor home. Property sold as-is.

Public Remarks: Downtown and a stone's throw to the Victor City Park (and music on main), this walkable home offers convenience, flexibility with no subdivision or HOA, and a variety of uses with mixed-use zoning. The home features a blend of original finishes that complement more recent changes with hardwood floors, a cozy propane stove and a mudroom breezeway connecting the living quarters with the one car garage featuring a trendy glass garage door. Opposite the garage, a workshop offers flexible space with potential for storage, workout, or even future additional living space. The in-town lot adds plenty of value with room for an auxiliary living unit or even a potential lot split pending City approval. A quiet location with mature trees and Southern mountain views round out this unique opportunity.
Private Remarks: Seller pays City of Victor irrigation water rights. The tap is at 150 East Birch which the owner has allowed seller to hook up a hose across his driveway and has agreed to let seller trench across and install tap. Age of home approximate.

Public Remarks: Nestled into a stunning 2.5 acre lot in the southern corner of Teton Valley, this circa 1912 farmhouse offers a rare opportunity to own a piece of Teton Valley history. Overflowing with days' past character and sophistication, the home was taken down to its studs and fully renovated in 2009. In 2021 the space above the garage was updated to offer either a guest studio or an office space. This home is being sold to with new plans for a stunning addition/renovation (4 bedroom/3 bath) designed by Dubbe Moulder Architects. A building permit has been approved by Teton County should a buyer choose to move forward with the project. Attached are renderings showing off the new design. Plans available upon request. Stunning views, minutes from downtown Victor, oversized garage, workshop, etc.

Public Remarks: Conveniently located between Driggs and Victor, this 6 bedroom, 3 1/2 bath home is situated on nearly 4 acres. Extensive masonry and landscaping add both privacy and style while allowing you to enjoy views of the Grand Tetons, Housetop Mountain, and unobstructed Big Hole Mountains to the west.  Sunsets can be enjoyed from two west facing decks, as well as the paver patio and firepit area.  Relax in your hammock or patio chair while enjoying the peaceful sound of your own waterfall and re-circling stream.  CCR's allow for both a guesthouse and ST Rentals, and a separate basement entrance and laundry room provide additional rental opportunities.  Home has a two-car garage as well as a 20'x28' shop providing ample storage for vehicles and toys.  Close to Teton River, bike path, and trailheads

Public Remarks: Spacious Victor Home with Barn and Guest Apartment.  This 5 bedroom, 4 bathroom home is located on 4.65 ac. The home has an open living design with a comfortable propane stove and a full basement that includes an additional living area.  The kitchen feature stainless appliances and a large pantry.  The main level master suite has access to the large east facing deck, a large bathroom, and walk in closet.  The home also features a 1,680 sq. ft. barn with workshop, drive thru garage doors on each end, a tack room, and 4 stalls.  The upstairs of the barn is a bright 720 sq. ft. 1 bedroom 1 bathroom apartment with a cozy propane fireplace.  The exterior of the home boasts mature landscaping, flowers beds, greenhouse and garden area, trail creek irrigation, fully fenced and a paved driveway
Private Remarks: All square feet calculations are estimates.  Buyer shall verify to their satisfaction.      The east exterior of the home was damaged in a deck fire.  Henderson Restoration completed the restoration work.  Certification available.

Public Remarks: Located just outside of Victor, this historical country farmhouse has been beautifully remodeled. Originally the ''Cedron Schoolhouse'', children would ride their horses to the school. This 1,682 square foot home has 3 bedrooms, 2.5 baths, an office and the two guest rooms have lofted sleeping spaces. The primary bathroom has heated floors and a glass shower. Throughout the home, you will find stunning details and custom finishes as a Master Builder created this home for his family. Situated on 1.26 acres, you will enjoy Grand Teton & Big Hole mountain views and a peaceful space on the covered porch.

Public Remarks: Fantastic recently built home just steps away from National Forest at Fox Creek Canyon.  Located on a spacious 1 acre lot, this property has great flexibility offering an inexpensive primary home, or a guest home once a main home is built.  With the majority of homes in the price point located along main thoroughfares in the valley, this wonderful property offers a rare opportunity in the price range to locate in a more rural mountain setting.  Constructed in 2020, the home is in like new condition.  Removing the labor and expense of updating.  Fantastic views in all directions with great House Top Mountain and sunset views.  Quick access to Victor and Driggs, just minutes to all of the amenities and recreational opportunities Teton Valley has to offer.  Water rights.  Lease thru Aug 2022
Private Remarks: Lease thru Aug 2022 must be honored.  Buyer to verify HOA Dues, they rise and fall with how much plowing.  Irrigation water $5/year.  Shed is NOT included in sale.

Properties like this do not come to market often so take advantage of this opportunity.

This house is a 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom, with a large 3-bay garage and an additional loft area above the garage for extra living space or storage. HOA open space exists adjacent to this home to the east and south, allowing for protected views and privacy. Pine flooring and knotty alder cabinetry, trim, and doors bring a warm atmosphere to the home.

Public Remarks: This custom home in the award-winning sustainably designed Mountainside Village Community is perfect for the savvy buyer who values craftsmanship & efficiency. 5 bedrooms & 3 bathrooms on 3 levels provide room to spread out. Clean lines, quartz counters, hardwood floors, reclaimed wood accents & composite decks provide a contemporary but classic aesthetic. Superior construction & spray foam insulation means whether you're burning wood or using the forced-air furnace, it won't take much to stay cozy in winter & cool in summer. Community resources include shared common area, playground, recycling, mail, volleyball, exclusive swimming pond, hiking & biking trails within walking distance, on the bike path to downtown Victor and easy access to Teton Pass off of Old Jackson Highway.

Public Remarks: WESTERN LUXURY IN Cherry Grove. This 4 bedroom, 3 bath, custom home on 3.6ac located near Darby Canyon between Driggs and Victor, is being sold tastefully furnished.   The open, eat in kitchen has been recently remodeled with new cabinets, quartz countertops, and appliances. The living room and spacious dining room are great entertaining spaces.   A huge lower level game and family room has a cozy fireplace for movie nights or watching the big game. The 24'x36' 3 car attached garage offers storage for all your mountain toys. Cherry Grove is known for it's beautiful homes, open space, and an average lot size of over 6 acres that is minutes away from multiple national forest trailheads and world class ski areas. A barn and/or guest house is allowed. This is your Teton Valley home!
Private Remarks: Fully furnished with artwork and  personal effects exempted from the list.

Located on 2.2 acres just outside Victor City limits, this property also has water rights from Trail Creek Irrigation. Approximately 1,424 sq.ft. of living space and 1,692 sq.ft. of garage/shop space consisting of an attached 3 car garage and a separate RV garage. This home is just the right fit for those looking for a quality home and ample storage for vehicles, toys and/or RV.

Public Remarks: Enjoy Teton views from a covered porch and sunsets behind the Big Holes, protected by a vast parcel to the west. Inside, the spacious, open floor plan basks in sunshine with light wood tones, unique accents and a chef's kitchen with high-end appliances. A main floor primary suite has a spa-like bathroom & walk-in closet. Downstairs you'll find a large and cozy living room, laundry room, office, a 3rd bathroom and 2 additional bedrooms. Perfect for horses or 4H animals, tack/feed room, shelter with water & electric, paddocks & pasture irrigation. Insulated garage/shop has plumbing, heat & a functioning 4th bathroom. Yard has 1/2 acre dog fence & low-maintenance landscaping, lush with wildflowers. This inviting & airy home, in a private and stunning setting has to be seen to be appreciated!
Private Remarks: Seller Concession was a $7000 credit towards buyers' lender approved closing costs.     Property is subject to a shared well agreement, included as a private document.

Short term rentals allowed with close proximity to the ice rink during kids hockey tournaments.

Public Remarks: You will appreciate the love and care that has gone into this cozy 3 bedrooms, 2 baths,1392 Sq. Ft. cabin style home, on 1.37 acres in rural Victor ID. The natural prairie grass lawn and many bushes are welcome surprise. The well laid out floor plan offers an open feel, remodeled kitchen; new appliances new window with oak trim and you will be able to enjoy the view of the Grand Teton, new oak cabinets, new granite countertops as well as an island with a granite top too. The home includes has a wood stove, central air conditioning and heating, baseboard heaters and many windows offering a view of the Big Hole Mtn or the Teton Mtn Range. The home will be sold partially furnished. Within 25 miles to Jackson, five minutes hiking, and 1 mile to Victor.  Home with a little work would be a Gem.

This efficient 'Wister' floor plan flows from front porch and entry way to hallway with 2 guest bedrooms and shared full bath with tub/shower, as well as a 1/2 bath (powder), laundry room and mudroom leading to 2 car garage. Excellent proximity to Victor, nearby golf course, and its short term rentals option makes this home a great fit for commuters, investment property, or second home buyers. Selling furnished - list upon request.

Public Remarks: This inviting Victor home boasts a spacious open concept floor plan. The kitchen is a cook's dream with expansive counter space and two ovens. The 4000 Sq Ft is laid out with the kitchen, dining and living areas, primary and guest bedroom on the main floor, taking advantage of beautiful light provided by large windows. The lower level has a generous family room and three additional bedrooms, one of which is large enough to accommodate a mother-in-law. Mature landscaping and a fenced backyard provides a sense of privacy on this .40 acre property, which is walking distance to town and just a 30 minute drive to Jackson Hole. A 728 Sq Ft 2-Bay Garage includes daylight workshop space.

Public Remarks: The search for your Teton Valley sanctuary ends here!  This beautifully crafted, 5-bedroom, 3-bathroom, custom home spans 3,136 square-feet across two levels. Located just north of Victor, midway between Jackson Hole and Grand Targhee, this home is ideal for full-time working commuters and short-term vacation renters. Set on 2.75 irrigated acres, this horse-friendly property welcomes you with a covered front porch which opens into the great room. A propane stove heats the cozy space and leads into the dining/kitchen area.  Primary suite, two bedrooms and bathroom complete the first floor. The lower-level hosts two bedrooms, full bathroom, den and a walk out basement and is easily transformable into a rental/in-law unit.
Private Remarks: One guest house allowed, not to exceed 4 buildings/structures total on any one lot.

Public Remarks: This beautiful luxury log cabin at Teton Springs is tucked up against the treed foothills of Targhee National Forest and offers stunning, elevated views of Columbine lake from the private back deck and outside access to the ground level below. Gorgeous wooden ceilings in the great room, solid granite in the kitchen, jetted tub in main bath are just a few of the upgrades. Currently in a short-term rental program.

Public Remarks: This stunning house is the perfect place to call home. With a large garage, you'll never have to worry about storage/parking again. The 9ft. ceilings provide an open and airy feel that will make you want to spend all your time at home.  The master bdrm is a true oasis with his and her walk-in closets, giving you ample storage space for all your belongings. Large windows throughout the house allow for plenty of natural light to flood in, creating a bright and cheerful atmosphere in this open floor plan. Whether you're entertaining guests or simply relaxing with family, this house offers the perfect space for all your needs.  The corner lot provides a bit more space and easy access. Great location for Jackson commuter. Come see for yourself and experience the many benefits of this home!

Champion Homes are built in Idaho and have a reputation for quality!  Landscaping is included.  A one year warranty is also included. Home is under construction. Public Remarks: Enjoy timeless Western style and foothill views from this lovely home on the 8th fairway at Teton Reserve in Victor. Beautifully landscaped with covered porches, a concrete patio & hot tub, ideal for outdoor entertaining or peaceful wildlife viewing. This home boasts hydronic in-floor heat, forced air heat & A/C along with a stacked rock propane fireplace. The primary bedroom with a steam shower is on the main floor as well as an office, mudroom and gourmet kitchen with an island & large pantry. Upstairs is a bonus room for pingpong, games or TV and 2 guest suites. The golf course is groomed for nordic skiing, short term rentals of 7+ days are allowed & $156/month HOA dues include water & sewer. Central to recreational access & 35 mins to Jackson Hole, this home has something for everyone!
Private Remarks: INTERIOR PHOTOS COMING SOON  Propane tank is buried and leased thru Fall River  HOA dues are billed quarterly  and include water and sewer. Yes there is forced air heat AND in floor heat AND A/C

Public Remarks: Bright and open describes this 3100 sq ft, 5bd/3ba home 2.5ac in Victor, ID.  Built in 2020, this newer home offers multiple living areas, oak hardwood flooring, an open kitchen with granite countertops and island bar seating.  The dining room and living room offer walls of windows for excellent natural light and views of the Teton Mountain range.   A main level primary bedroom suite, and 2 guest bedrooms with full bath round out this level.  Downstairs is a media room, additional bedrooms, bath, storage and workout areas.  Located in a quite area of Victor, with Trail Creek irrigation rights and horses allowed, and easy access to Grand Targhee and Jackson Hole.

Public Remarks: New construction complete on a custom site in Teton Reserve overlooking the Teton Range and the 8th fairway.  This custom floor plan is designed to blend modern aesthetic with the high end nature of this paved community. 626 Royal Elk borders open space on one of the community's large custom home lots. The floor plan offers ground floor living with every bedroom featuring an ensuite, an open concept living layout, a large bonus room with private bath upstairs, perfect for a bunk room or large private office. Quality, custom finishes include modern alder cabinets, quartz countertops, Pella Windows, a stone fireplace and much more. The ''Reserve'' features a public, HOA owned course with relaxed amenities and a winter Nordic track.

Public Remarks: Picturesque Modern Retreat.  This home is located near the base of Teton Pass in Mountainside Village.  Built by quality builders this 2 bed, 2 bath home has a covered front porch facing the southwest to take in the mountain views and sunsets.  The main level has wood beam accents in the ceiling, gray wood toned laminate flooring, powder room, kitchen island with butcherblock counters and kitchen with concrete counters.  The black spiral staircase takes you upstairs to two bright bedrooms and a bathroom with a large shower with black monolith tile.  There are plans available for the main home.  Enjoy the convenience of a detached garage and the potential to generate income through short-term rentals with a minimum of 7 days.  Come and experience the best of Victor, ID living

Public Remarks: Located in River Meadows with paved access and Stunning views, this home screams curb appeal with timbers over the front door and a blend of wood and stone. The entry gives way to a large living room with cozy woodstove and den, perfect for a home office. The remodeled kitchen boasts beautiful stone countertops and floating shelves complimenting the custom tile backsplash. Hardwood floors carry into the main floor suite with large walk-in, claw foot tub, custom tiled shower and dual sinks. Two guest bedrooms with walk-in closets and a large bonus room with private bath over the garage rounds out the functional interior space. The fenced rear yard is where this home really shines with an East facing covered deck perfect for enjoying Teton Valley's warm Summers in the cool mountain shade.
Private Remarks: The HOA Board has recently approved a one time assessment of $250 and an increase to the reserve fund of  $25/mo beginning Jan 1, 2024. This will bring annual fees to $2313.12/yr + whatever the CPI index is in Nov 2024. There is an additional water charge from May-Sept of $1.50/1000 gals used over 5,000 gals.

Public Remarks: Custom Timber Frame Home- This 3-bedroom, 3-bathroom home, on 2.63-acres, features an open kitchen, dining and living room with cathedral ceilings and fireplace, perfect for relaxing and entertaining and a detached 160 sqft office/studio. A large covered deck off of the living room makes it easy to enjoy the outdoors and Teton views. Hydronic in-floor heat warms the entry saltine tiles and provides a cozy area to welcome you home. The primary suite includes in-floor heat, walk in closet, propane fireplace and abundant natural light. The upstairs loft, with the third bedroom, offers great overflow space. The lower level offers a guest suite and access an oversized garage. Two oversized garage bays supply plenty of space for your toys, as well as a 9' door for oversized vehicles.
Private Remarks: Per the CCR's, rentals of the home must be for 180-days or longer.

Public Remarks: TWO corner lots! Incredibly well-maintained, move-in ready 3 bed, 2 bath home. Centrally located within the Valley Vista Estates development between Victor and Driggs, offering paved roads, a community playground and easy access to Highway 33; this affordable newer home is ready for new owners. With over 1,700 square feet of living space, and an oversized 2 car garage, this modern-styled but cozy home features a fireplace to accentuate the living area, a large primary suite complete with spacious bath and closet which is separated from the two guest bedrooms with bath, and a functional, modern kitchen with ample cabinetry and storage. The front yard offers Southern exposure, while the rear of the home has a fenced yard - perfect for those 4 legged friends who love mountain adventures!

Public Remarks: This exceptionally well maintained Teton Springs home on a pond includes the beautifully landscaped adjacent lot. Well laid-out with a spacious kitchen and open floor plan, the home offers forced air heat & AC, room to spread out on the bright & sunny main level and 2 suites on the 2nd floor. Entertaining can overflow to the covered back deck and side yard patio overlooking the pond. There is a designated laundry room, pantry and half bath on the 1st floor where exposed beams, hardwood floors, oversized windows and a cozy fireplace set the ambiance. Upstairs, the primary bedroom suite has a rich tongue & groove ceiling adding charm to the practicality of the property. Minutes to Jackson Hole with golf course and water views plus the added privacy of owning the landscaped lot next door!

Public Remarks: Teton Valley Cabin in the Woods.  Rare combination of location, privacy, and national forest access.  This 1800 sq ft, 4bd/2ba home offers end of the road privacy and direct access to millions of acres of the Caribou-Targhee National Forest, which is contiguous to the Bridger-Teton and Grand Teton National Park, out the back door.  Located at the top of Shooting Star Ranch between Victor and Driggs, this cozy log home offers multiple living areas, excellent western exposure, and a detached 2 car garage for all the gear.  A sportsman's dream, with hiking, skiing, and exploring the great outdoors a daily routine.  An easy drive to Grand Targhee or Jackson Hole, come take a look at this amazing mountain retreat.
Private Remarks: A guest house up to 900 sq ft is permitted per the Shooting Star CCR's.    Furnishings may be negotiable, but are not included in the list price.

Public Remarks: This charming 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom, stick-built home with an attached garage is in a great neighborhood within walking distance to downtown Victor. All appliances are included, new LVP flooring, tile & heaters were added in 2020. The huge backyard is completely fenced and provides room to add on to the home and/or create additional outdoor living space. Enjoy low utilities, minimal HOA fees of only $10/month, city sewer and water and avoid overage charges by connecting to Trail Creek irrigation. Willow Creek Ranch is a lovely established community with city plowed paved roads, a playground and water rights, and allows short term rentals- a Teton Valley favorite among commuters, families, retirees and investors alike, and a perfect bike ride home from Music on Main!

Private setting surrounded by cottonwood, aspen, evergreens & sage. 2 story gambrel style home with covered porches, back deck, fenced yard, greenhouse, 230sq.ft +loft insulated & heated outbuilding for office space or potential ADU (no occupancy cert)& storage shed. Perfect for employee housing, rentals or a primary residence; zoning allows an ADU up to 900sq.ft. With no deed restrictions & Rural Neighborhood zoning, this property has so much potential!

Public Remarks: Peaceful, quiet, end-of-the-road living captures the tranquil setting of this single level 3-bedroom 3-bathroom home in Aspen Lake. With the home set in the middle of the 2.5-acre lot, there is ample room for a barn or a couple of run-in sheds which is ideal for horses. The landscaping is mature and well maintained ~ enjoy the fruits from 2 apple trees, 2 Japanese cherry trees, and 2 Canadian cherry trees. A back deck with evening shade provides a perfect venue for entertaining with views over the backyard and neighboring yards to the east towards the Tetons.  An irrigation system, buried propane tank, detached studio with power are a few other niceties you will find at this well-maintained home.

Partial basement/cellar was also added for yet more storage!

Public Remarks: Located 2 miles North Victor, tucked away in a beautiful forest of trees, this home sits on 2.2 acres, and only a few deed restrictions. With a seasonal stream, this peaceful location invites native wildlife like moose, a variety of birds and deer. Built in 1999, 2,684 sq. ft. this 4 bedroom, 3 bath farmhouse has hardwood floors, two expansive suites, and two more beds and bath. The living area features a beautiful fireplace and media area in addition to the dining and functional kitchen. In addition to the attached, 900 sq. ft. garage, there is also a 1,152 sq. ft. detached, heated barn with storage loft and horse set-up. Other buildings include a garden shed in the back yard and an approximately 800 sq. ft. Quonset with concrete floor for a shop, equipment and/or storage.

Public Remarks: An entire new roof with 10 year extended warranty has been installed on this light & bright 4 bedroom, 4 bathroom home in Teton Springs. The spacious open-concept floor plan enjoys an oversized island & dining area open to the living room with a double-sided fireplace, refinished oak floors and contemporary updates throughout. The addition of a shower to the main level bathroom provides a 4th first floor suite, with 3 other suites on the 2nd level. New insulation & roofing improve efficiency while a new shed roof covering the back porch expands your entertaining space. The surprisingly private back yard boasts raised garden beds & lush landscaping. Walk to the gym/pool/golf course or bike out your door to access the endless south valley trails; all a quick 30 minutes to Jackson Hole!

Public Remarks: Exquisite construction located along the fairway of the 4th hole at the Teton Reserve community course! This new home features massive clad Pella windows that take in sunlight and views of the Snake River range. The open concept living area features built-in Wolf Sub-Zero appliances, custom built-in cabinet lighting, huge linear gas fireplace with plaster finish and more. Full hardwood oak continues into the main floor primary suite with walk-in closet and access to one of the home's many covered patios. The luxurious attached bath includes a matte white soaker tub with accent wall, floating vanity and walk-in shower with Euro glass. Custom wood and metal railing leads to 3 more bedrooms upstairs, two sharing and oversized Jack and Jill bath with the 3rd bedroom serving as a guest suite.
Private Remarks: Landscaping is not included in the purchase price.    HOA information & documents can be found at: tetonreserve.org

Public Remarks: Location, location, location!  One of the closest residences to Teton Pass, you can be to the Mt. Glory boot pack in less than 10 minutes and Jackson Hole Mountain Resort in 30-minutes.  This 3-bedroom, 1-bathroom, 952 SqFt cabin also provides easy access to Moose Creek and Mike Harris trailheads, and a quick bike ride to downtown Victor via the ''shared use'' road.  Enjoy Trail Creek running through your back yard and foothill views from the East facing deck.  Whether Jackson employee or outdoor enthusiast, this quaint little cabin is the perfect basecamp for all your Teton Valley (ID & WY) adventures!

Public Remarks: Beautiful property and setting for this mature manufactured home with no HOA and no CCRs. Situated on a sprawling 2.53-acre lot with native cottonwood and other mature trees, this home is convenient to both Victor and Driggs. The 2bd / 1bth home features a standing seam metal roof, is on a permanent foundation and has been declared real property. Additionally, there is a detached, insulated shop of approximately 1,200 sq ft with propane heat. The setting is beautiful and serene and makes a great basecamp for enjoying all the recreational opportunities available in the area. Don't let this opportunity pass you by!

Public Remarks: Victor home on 2.5 acres with Modern Flare!  This lovely 3900 sq ft. residence is located in East Fox Creek, between Victor and Driggs in a relaxed community that allows guest houses, short term rentals and outbuildings. A 2020 build, this like-new home has a gourmet kitchen complete with double ovens, a huge island with sink and a butler's pantry. The main floor has 3 bedrooms plus an office, powder room, large laundry plus mud room. The lower level has a huge family room featuring a high tech theatre with a 120 inch screen and projector and is roughed-in for a kitchenette. Three more bedrooms plus an exercise/bonus room complete the package. With in-floor heat, oversized garage with epoxy floors, paved driveway and a hot tub to relax under the stars, this property is sure to please!

Public Remarks: Fully remodeled in 2021, this Willow Creek home is on an oversized lot, walking distance to downtown Victor. Tastefully updated with classically contemporary finishes, new appliances, radiant cove heaters and luxury vinyl flooring throughout. The upgraded kitchen includes an island, ample storage & quartz countertops. Well laid-out with a main-level primary suite, 2 more bedrooms, a 2nd bathroom and spacious open living/dining/kitchen area. The 2 car garage is extra deep, providing room for additional toy storage or workspace. Enjoy a fully fenced backyard on irrigation and a sunny south-facing deck with unobstructed vistas. The outdoor space includes a new storage shed for tools & gear. Set yourself up for the convenience of in-town Victor living or a short ride to Jackson for commuters.

Public Remarks: On the outskirts of downtown Victor, this walkable home in the coveted Mountain Shadows community features two additions that bring extra space and unique features to the beautiful site that boasts mature landscape, gardens and producing fruit trees. Two great rooms on either side of the kitchen provide tons of living space and a cozy wood stove. The addition includes a gas stove, hardwood, timbers and plenty of natural light. The South wing includes a 2nd suite, two guest bedrooms and a guest bath. The North wing addition features a second primary suite with curbless shower, hardwood and ample closet space. Speaking of storage, the oversized two-car garage is deep enough to include shop space, and a small basement below the living room addition provides food storage and an office.

This property combines tranquility and convenience in a picturesque setting.

Public Remarks: Discover endless possibilities on this .51 acre lot, with light CC&Rs, allowing you freedom to customize. Conveniently located in between Victor and Driggs, this versatile property currently features a small manufactured home with a newer rubber membrane roof. The home is in need of work and updating, or removal to pave the way for your vision. Whether you desire a tiny home, a container home, or a custom home, this property is your canvas. The property is being SOLD AS IS. The mobile home is a 1973 Pre-HUD manufactured home and is likely not eligible for conventional financing. Any financed offer must be accompanied by an appropriate Pre-Qualification Letter. HOA dues to be verified by Buyer to Buyers satisfaction. Dues may only cover water fees, the property is on a community well.
Private Remarks: The mobile home is in less than ideal condition and will require significant work to bring it up to standard. It is habitable, and appears to have a water tight roof, but is in rough condition. Please make Buyer's aware.

Public Remarks: Beautiful mountain home in Teton Springs Golf Resort boasting 2742 Sq. ft. on 2 levels with 3 bedroom suites & a 4th half bathroom. The main home features a beautifully designed interior complete with a bright and open floor plan, gourmet kitchen with custom cabinetry, mudroom, hardwood floors, attached two car garage and outdoor deck. Built in 2021, the newly constructed and fully furnished guest home features 1,000 square feet of functional space with mountain inspired design. Enjoy the open concept of the two-bedroom, one and half bathroom home complete with wood stove, washer and dryer and deck with Taylor Mountain views. Conveniently located near Teton Pass, experience the ultimate mountain escape.

Public Remarks: Discover privacy and serenity among the trees in the heart of Teton Valley. Sold furnished, this warm and inviting custom home is situated on two separately deeded parcels totaling 8.2 acres, with extensive mature landscaping and meticulously maintained lawns. The open floor plan, a charming custom kitchen, and multiple living areas make it easy to stay in and enjoy the stunning views of the Tetons. At the same time, the central location provides nearby access to the Teton River via Paradise Creek and a short trip to Victor and Driggs' amenities on paved roads.   Enjoy your morning sunrises on the deck and dine on your secluded patio. The conveniently located mudroom with an additional entrance seamlessly integrates the garage and helps keep your home clean.
Private Remarks: This property is a must see for anyone looking for  a quality home and a unique setting.  Fully furnished.  Water rights.  Two Separately deeded lots. Over 300 trees planted.  Newer appliances, new boiler for infloor heat, getting stained any day.  No interior photos for owner privacy so please come to appreciate.

Public Remarks: Charming log home on 1 acre on the Pine Creek bench just minutes from Victor, ID.  No CCR's or HOA!  Enjoy the amazing Teton range and forest views from the covered decks and yard.  The 2bd/2ba interior is in excellent condition, with the kitchen, dining room and sunken living room offer a charm and coziness not often found.  2 propane stoves add ambiance and warmth.  A large log shop/garage has room for vehicles and more, and 2 additional sheds allow for animals or additional storage.  A private and serine property like this is the ultimate ''cabin in the woods'' that is just minutes to downtown Victor, national forest access, and skiing at Grand Targhee and Jackson Hole.  A unique and hard to find Teton Valley gem.
Private Remarks: No HOA dues but neighbors collaborate and pool funds for winter snow plowing and road maintenance.

Public Remarks: Rare offering at Sorensen Creek Subdivision in the foothills of the Teton Mountain Range. Discover tranquility with this attractive 4 Bed, 3 Bath home, situated on 4.57 acres of pristine Aspen forest. This secluded property is surrounded by mature trees and abundant wildlife, providing a serene escape from the hustle and bustle of everyday life. Enjoy sweeping views of Teton Valley below from the expansive deck and well landscaped yard space, ideal for outdoor living and entertaining. The spacious garage with a unique adjacent shop space is the perfect accent to keep, and maintain, the vehicles and toys essential to the lifestyle of our resort community. Quick access to Driggs, Victor, National Forest, Grand Targhee Resort and all of the amenities and recreation Teton Valley has to offer.

Public Remarks: Nestled conveniently between Victor and Driggs, this home offers views of the Big Hole Mountains. Built in 2020, the home features an open floor plan with a spacious kitchen and dining area that flows seamlessly to a back deck overlooking a fully fenced yard?perfect for entertaining or relaxing. The  landscaped yard includes a sprinkler system and trees, adding privacy and charm.  The large primary bedroom boasts two closets and an ensuite bathroom with a walk-in tiled shower. Two additional bedrooms share a full bath, offering comfortable space for family or guests. An attached two-car garage keeps you out of the elements and provides ample space for storing toys.  Located in a neighborhood with paved roads and a park, this home combines modern comfort with outdoor beauty.

The dedicated dining area leads to a  fully landscaped rear yard with an expanded and covered patio. The main floor primary suite includes a walk-in closet and spacious bath. This efficient floorplan is unique with a half bath for guests, dedicated laundry/storage and a mudroom off of the garage. Public Remarks: One-of-a-kind, 3-story luxury cabin, rebuilt down to the studs, warm modern Alpine retreat with Scandinavian-inspired design and Teton views. Situated on 2.5 acres, minutes from Grand Targhee and Jackson Hole, this cozy property is a dream getaway or residence, previously rented on Airbnb for $800 per night. Highlights include a hot tub, gas fireplace, fenced 2-acre backyard, garden beds, fruit trees, and custom shed. The main floor features an open kitchen and living space, pantry, mudroom, powder room, and laundry. The large private primary suite spans an entire floor with a den, built-ins, soaker tub, and walk-in closet. Guest bedrooms share a bath and an additional family room. With space for horses, or a barn/guest house, this rare gem is the most special opportunity in Teton Valley.

Public Remarks: This stellar home in Victor is a dream! Got kids? It's got 5 bedrooms. Got less kids? There is space for an office, yoga, workout, music room, etc. Choose your own adventure, the possibilities are endless, especially with two separate living areas! For the cooks and entertainers, there is a beautiful open kitchen and the large back patio off of the dining area is a great place for summer BBQs and outdoor gatherings. The large back yard is also fenced for the furry friends. Forest access, skiing, mountain biking and hiking trails as well as fishing are only a few minutes away and you can walk or take the bike path into town for dinner, coffee, drinks with friends, live music, the list goes on. The dream is real--and it can be yours!

Public Remarks: True to its name, Cottonwood Shadows is a serene retreat where this charming craftsman-style home is tucked among towering Cottonwood groves. Perched atop a spacious garage/shop, the home blends wood siding with clad windows adding timeless character. A brand-new wraparound deck with metal railing captures breathtaking views of the surrounding ranges. Inside, a slate-tile entry with custom wainscot leads to the charming living space with vaulted ceilings, built-ins, and oak floors. The chef's kitchen features butcher block counters and a premium range hood, adding an artisan flair to the space. 2 bedrooms share a large bath, and one enjoys direct deck access. A separate office and mudroom/laundry can be found adjacent to the garage. Impeccably maintained, this hidden gem is a rare find!

Great home for entertaining or just sitting on the deck watching the clouds over the Tetons. Don't forget to check out the virtual tour!

Public Remarks: Sometimes you find the home that has it all!  This well designed, Swedish cope style log home has a well designed floor plan, perfect, unobstructable Teton Views from the living area/bedrooms, close proximity to Driggs & Grand Targhee, & beautiful finishes!  Relax by the fireplace & take in the breathtaking view from the open living area.  Soak up the views from the large deck facing the Tetons in summer.  Well landscaped yard benefits from irrigation water rights.  Large unfinished basement is ready for your ideas.  Add bedrooms or use for workshop/storage space.  Oversized, deep garage is perfect for your vehicles/toys.  Radiant floor heat in main level & garage, top end appliances, wool carpet, steam shower & 2nd fireplace in the master.  Bonus room upstairs adds options!

Public Remarks: Located just outside city limits, this home sits just above Ski Hill Road, en route to Grand Targhee Ski Resort. No CC&Rs and prime location for vacation rental, second home or primary residence. This property is in the process of a lot split that will put the home on approx. 1.7 acres with trees and native shrubs. The home is ICF construction (foam block/concrete walls), which not only provide stable temperature ranges year round, but also energy efficiency. The upper and lower level of the home can be occupied/rented separately. The main level has 1 bedroom, 2 bathrooms, living/dining area, full kitchen and loft. The lower level has 2 bedrooms, 1 bath, living area, laundry and kitchenette. Both levels have in-floor heat with a new boiler. Showings can begin Feb. 6 10:00am ''Open House''

Public Remarks: 3,220 square foot hangar home attached to a 4,000 sq. ft. airplane hangar with a door opening of 50' wide x 16' high. Paved taxiway access to the Driggs Airport taxiway & runway 04/22, which are 7,300' long by 100' wide (2 published GPS approaches and full service FBO). The home has 3 bedrooms and 3 full bathrooms. The interior is a mix of hardwoods including Alder doors, Cherry cabinets & trim, Fir staircase and Walnut accents. The massive island is the centerpiece of the kitchen which has top notch appliances & granite countertops. In-floor heat throughout the home. Large sunroom off the kitchen and massive rock fireplace (wood burning) with Cherry mantle. In-Floor heat throughout the home. 2 of the bathrooms have jetted tubs and glass & tile showers with sauna steamers.

Buyer could convert back to a ''duplex'' style home or keep as-is. Compact, easy keeper has custom and artistic woodwork, in-floor heat, art deco and designer tile in kitchen and baths, custom cabinets, unique and pleasing to the eye. Public Remarks: The quintessential Teton Valley property- not in a subdivision- custom home with 3 beds/2 baths, oversized 48x36ft insulated & heated shop & 1 bed/1 bath studio rental/guest quarters with hydronic heat. Charmingly finished with barn wood, custom cabinetry & historic timbers, only a bike ride away from downtown Driggs with quick access to Grand Targhee ski resort. Efficient radiant heat panels throughout, supplemented by a wood-burning stove, will keep you cozy all winter long. The shop is perfect for RV & toy storage needed for the ultimate Valley lifestyle or for a tradesperson running a home business. Whether it's a spin around on the pump/dirt bike track or relaxing in the hot tub- do as you wish on 2.5 acres with no CCRs & no HOA. Come see the many possibilities this property offers!
Private Remarks: Full shop is 48x36ft; studio apartment is 12x30, the rear storage unit is 12x6, the work shop is 24x36, and the covered carport is 12x36.

Exclusions: Mudroom coat hooks, instrument hooks, bath mirrors, kid curtains are excluded; dining table, mudroom lockers negotiable

Public Remarks: Driggs Home with Convenient central Location.  This 3 bedroom 2 bathroom home is located only minutes from Driggs, Victor with quick access to skiing at Grand Targhee Resort.  The interior of the home features a large, custom stone fireplace, an open kitchen, dining and living space with cathedral ceilings and wood flooring throughout the home.  The home is located on 2.72 acres with a mature landscaping and a seasonal stream on the east boundary.  The outdoor living abounds with a stone patio overlooking the Teton Mountains and a covered porch towards the west and the Big Hole Mountains.  E Rendezvous subdivision allows for horses, and the parcel can accomodate a guest home and dettached barn/shop/garage.  Don't miss this opportuinity with so few homes on market.  No showings until 5/16

Public Remarks: Here's your true Rustic Cabin in Teton Valley, ID! This cabin may not be located in the mountains, however it is located in downtown Driggs! Just a minutes walk or bike ride to all the amenities town has to offer.  Not in a subdivision, no CC&R's, public water and sewer and a fenced back yard. This property is zoned RS7; which can accommodate single-family detached houses with a minimum lot size of 7,000 sq ft. Additional building types allowed that include backyard cottage, cottage court, duplex and attached house.
Private Remarks: This home more than likely will not qualify for lending.    RS7 should be applied in areas where the land use pattern is predominately single-or two-family that is served by central water and sewer facilities or where lunch land use patterns is desired in the future. Uses that would interfere with the residential nature of the district area.

Public Remarks: Lovely, updated mountain home in a private setting within walking distance to the town of Driggs. This beautiful move-in ready 3 bedroom/3 bath retreat enjoys natural light throughout its 2600 sq.ft. The open floor plan main level boasts an updated kitchen, wood-burning stove, Douglas fir floors & a spacious master suite. Upstairs two large guest bedrooms are located off a generous 2nd family room with office space & a private balcony. The sunny & partially treed estate lot enjoys mature landscaping, sprinkler system, a large wraparound deck & patio with new hot tub. An oversized 2 car garage provides ample room for all your mountain toys. Enjoy the convenience of in-town living right off the bike path without giving up the flora & fauna you've imagined in your Teton Valley dream property.

Public Remarks: This is your chance to own a beautiful home in the heart of Driggs with excellent access to schools, Main Street, restaurants and all of the recreation that makes Teton Valley so incredible. A mature lawn and large fenced-in back yard surround the home with an expansive back deck overlooking the mountains to the East. A hot tub is built into the deck and included with the property. Public Remarks: This countryside cottage is located minutes from Driggs, ID near the mouth of Darby canyon, a popular hiking and recreation destination. While modest in terms of its size, the home features a craftsman's touch with a harmonious blend of contemporary and mountain finishes throughout. The main floor features roughs on floors, concrete window sills and more. Upstairs, you will find a loft suite complete with private bedroom, loft area and bath. The basement includes laundry, mechanical and room for guests. Outside you will find an expansive South-facing deck and a number of fruit trees. The detached studio and garage/carport create the perfect workspace, complete with a timber frame loft and cozy wood burning stove. Minimal covenants provide flexibility with ample space on 2.5 acres.

Short term rentals are allowed for 2 weeks each month.

Public Remarks: Charming 1940s farm house updated in 2017, in a lovely setting with mature trees and so much potential. Already set up for horses & chickens with multiple outbuildings including a detached 2-car garage, chicken house, ''she-shed'' or artist's studio, silo, hay storage/horse shelter. Irrigation water hooked up to an auto-system makes it easy to keep the pasture green. Updated kitchen, cozy wood stove, designated mud room with utility sink & laundry and a covered patio for outdoor entertaining add to the home's appeal. Conveniently located Southeast of Driggs with pastoral views of farm fields, Darby Canyon and the foothills of the Tetons. Schedule a time to see all this property has to offer!

Public Remarks: If you're looking for an ideal piece of the Teton Valley to call your own, look no further than this beautiful, waterfront home. Located in the heart of the valley just outside of Driggs, this nearly 3,300 square foot, 5-bedroom, 4-bath home is an angler's paradise. Public Remarks: Beautiful new modern mountain home in Driggs with tall ceilings, open floor plan, modern style fixtures, interior white oak doors, and floating stairs with a steel cable railing. Four of the bedrooms are located upstairs. The main floor fifth bedroom is perfect as an office. The landscaping includes automatic sprinklers, mature trees, and perennials. The family room is framed by windows, showcasing an amazing view of the Tetons. The bonus room overlooks the valley. Gorgeous hardwood floors are in the main area. The master bathroom has a freestanding tub. Two of the bedrooms have walk in closets. The kitchen has a huge pantry, quartz countertops, gas stove and ample cupboard space. The outside fireplace is perfect for enjoying the view. Minutes to State Line Road/Ski Hill, 18 to Targhee.

Public Remarks: Enjoy proximity to restaurants, parks, schools and recreation from this beautiful home in downtown Driggs. Just off of Ski Hill Road, this split-level home is on a corner lot and is fully landscaped with tall trees, vibrant flower beds, lush grass, a rustic log storage shed and a garden area. Whether used as a full-time residence, vacation home or a rental this property is worth a look!

Public Remarks: Without a doubt, this charming, Crafstman style home and guest cottage are located in a very unique location, next to the Driggs Airport. No CC&Rs or HOA fees. Located at the very Northern edge of City limits, this property has city water and sewer services.  If you love airplanes, this home offers an elevated, front row seat (balcony) for watching airplanes taxi, take off & land.  The home itself is incredibly well built with stained concrete flooring and hydronic in-floor heat on the main level. The upper level has circular sawn hardwood flooring, granite counter tops in the kitchen and a very large Windmill Fan to keep the place both looking cool and feeling cool. The guest cottage/office measures 192 sq. ft. and is heated and well insulated. The storage shed also measures 192 sq. ft.
Legal Description: Lot 14B, Block 1, Flying Saddle Subdivision, Teton County, Idaho
Contact listing agent to schedule showings.  Owner Occupied.
Directions: From Hwy. 33 North side of Driggs, turn right on Rodeo Dr. and travel approx. 1/2 mile East.  Only home on right, before road turns North.

Public Remarks: UNIQUE AND RARE FIND! This property is in the process of a lot split. Two lots and a whole lot of charm and history behind this restored ''Buxton'' home. This charming bungalow restoration has been updated for today while maintaining the historic design and details of the past. Fall in love with the wrap around covered arched porch. The exterior of the main house is all original wood siding. The garage and mud room were built in 2001-2 to match the original house. The character, unique architecture and craftmanship with its ornate design is warm and vibrant. Entering into the home's spacious entryway, your first impression is ''wow''. Two more beautiful architectural designed arches draw your eye to the open-concept floor plan. From living room, to dining room, to the kitchen
Private Remarks: County records note age of home 1950 - Seller believes it was 1925.  There is no HOA to speak of. Kristen Johnson handles the snow plowing; approximately $100.00 per year.

Public Remarks: Ranchette ready to go! Bring your horses! Home on 20 acres with horse set-up including a riding arena, 2 run-ins for horses, huge garage/shop for hay storage, and water rights. Located near Darby Canyon between Victor & Driggs, this spacious, bright home has ample windows to take in the valley views, has a huge south facing deck & covered porch on the north. Two large living areas that are separated by a massive double-sided stone fireplace. Large kitchen with granite countertops, kitchen island, stainless steel appliances, gas range, custom alder cabinets & travertine tile floors. Large master bedroom with walk-in closet & luxurious ensuite bathroom. Appx 560 sq ft of the home is being utilized as a separate apartment with its own kitchen, bathroom & loft bedroom. 4 car garage/workshop
Private Remarks: One bedroom is in the main house and one bedroom is in the apartment, which is attached to the main house. Square footage and year built to be verified by buyer to buyer satisfaction. Back-up offers are welcome.

Public Remarks: Country charmer on 3.75 acres! This well maintained home located between Victor and Driggs has fantastic wraparound porches on three sides. The lush, mature landscaping adds to this very quiet and private setting.  Boasting 2 gas fireplaces, wood floors, vaulted ceilings, jetted tub, a sunny ''open concept'' great room and outdoor entertaining spaces, this residence is sure to please.  Located on a quiet cul de sac, the neighborhood allows horses and other animals (See CCR's). Guest homes and other outbuildings are permitted too. This home also has a separate 50 amp service to park your RV next to the garage. Beautifully maintained and the perfect central location for all of your Teton adventures. Almost equidistant between Grand Targhee and Jackson Hole. Shown by appointment.

Public Remarks: New Construction home in Calico Sky with an estimated completion date of April 2022. This home is incredibly spacious with 7 bedrooms, a massive 3-car garage and tons of functional gathering spaces throughout - all on nearly half an acre. High-quality finishes throughout include GE stainless appliances, alder cabinetry, quartz countertops, Moen plumbing fixtures, durable LVP flooring and Andersen windows all wrapped up in a tasteful modern style. Enjoy proximity to parks, schools, downtown Driggs, restaurants and Grand Targhee Resort from this location in a well-established neighborhood. This home can be used as a short-term rental or full-time residence. Landscaping and sprinkler system are included but will not be installed until late spring 2022.
Private Remarks: Estimated completion in April of 2022. Sprinkler system and landscaping will be installed in late spring. Buyer modifications may be possible at seller's discretion.

Public Remarks: Truly one-of-a- kind home located just north of Driggs, ID with protected Teton Views on arguably one of the best lots in Saddlehorn Ranch. This unique property offers a main residence, two cozy sleeping cabins, 13x25 workshop, garden, and art studio with inspiring Grand Teton views.  The craftsmanship and creativity that went into this home continuously displays the attention to detail throughout the residence and property. The open concept kitchen is tailored for practical use with oversized soapstone countertops and custom cabinetry. The two outdoor decks give you an optimal second story view of a diverse landscape of native trees and wildflowers planted by current owners to flourish for years to come. Photos can only show so much, as this is a home you simply have to see.

Public Remarks: Open House Oct. 2nd, 9:30 to 11. Offers due by Oct. 2nd at Noon. SKI HILL RD FIXER UPPER. One thing this Valley is truly short on is affordable fixer uppers. This one is well located on an oversized 1 acre lot in one of Ski Hill Rd's most popular locations, Targhee Ranch; 3 mile drive to Driggs & 9 miles to the ski resort. Teton and Grand Targhee views. Bones of this old house are sound; standing on a poured concrete foundation w/ a full un-finished basement, which is dry & odor free. Potential is huge for the individual willing to put in the time and effort to recondition this home. Fully functional, move in ready.  Additional 1.081 acre adjoining parcel is available for an additional $159,900 with purchase of the home; (lot is NOT available separate from home). NO TRESPASS PLEASE!

Public Remarks: Fantastic location in Driggs! Bring all of your toys. Single story, 3 bedroom, 2 full bath home with oversized 2-car garage/shop. Loft space (unheated) included in total square footage.  Attractive combination of log and modern styles. Makeover of home in 2006 included enlarging the master bedroom and bath. Eat-in galley kitchen with inviting window alcove. Baseboard heat and pellet stove. Wood and tile flooring. Pella windows. Laundry/mud room. Insulated garage has automatic garage doors (2) and a pellet stove for heat. Large fenced yard with shed and room for a garden. Walking distance to schools, shopping, hospital, and restaurants. Twenty minutes to Grand Targhee.   Large .65 acre lot which can be divided (zoned RS-7, single & two family).  Open house: Sunday, October 3, 11-1
Private Remarks: Seller has asked that there be no showings prior to 11AM if possible. Two hour notice if possible. Dogs need to be removed. Please contact Glenn for appointment.  Thank you.

Public Remarks: Super cute in-town Driggs home, across the street from the City Park. Walking distance to EVERYTHING downtown. Beautifully remodeled in 2016/2017 including many window replacements, new flooring, high efficiency electric heaters, oak interior stairs; both bathrooms remodeled; solid wood Alder interior doors and all new interior trim; insulated blinds on windows; electric and lighting updates; drywall, paint and more. Entire home exterior just freshly painted in October, 2021. Excellent location for both long and short term rentals. Most furnishings and household goods are included.  This home has character and charm that is hard to find and difficult to replicate. Please ask your agent to share private remarks regarding construction and financing. Open house Wednesday, Nov 10, 12-3pm.
Private Remarks: The original (1910 construction) portion of the home has a 580 sq ft footprint and is on a stacked stone foundation.. Multiple additions over the years are on poured concrete foundations.  Home may or may not be eligible for conventional bank financing due to stacked stone portion of foundation.  Home has tested between 9 and 10 PCi/L for Radon and has not been mitigated. Home being sold as-is.

This listing also included the adjacent vacant lot providing endless opportunities.

Public Remarks: Driggs home on 2.2 acres with FULL Four Peak Teton Views!  Charming  2005 abode with cathedral windows to take in the view, & located minutes from Ski Hill Rd (Easy Access to Grand Targhee). Boasting nearly 2000 sq ft, this home has a large main bedroom upstairs with a jetted tub and balcony. The ground floor has 2 other bedrooms which share a full bath. The large kitchen with an island is open to a sitting room, and there is also another living room with a beautiful River rock fireplace (wood burner). Featuring bamboo flooring, a pantry/ laundry room off the kitchen, and over 2 acres of elbow room with relaxed CCR's, this country home has lots to offer. Front door & sliders are new, appliances are 3 yrs old. A few areas of trim, and siding that need TLC- a handy person's dream property!
Private Remarks: 1000 gallon buried propane tank is owned and included. Bully barn shed and play area swingset  are included. Drip system with ''rings'' around all trees on the  berm.   Washer & dryer and kitchen refrigerator included are only 3 yrs old.     Seller concession was a $10,000 credit towards lender fees    Possession is negotiable, delayed possession for sellers would be preferred

Public Remarks: Original owner, impeccably maintained and cared for, custom built home in prime Teton view corridor to the NE of Driggs. Located in the private, exclusive, end of the road community of Bear Creek Estates; just 10 minutes from Driggs and 11 mile  drive to Grand Targhee ski resort. Location is unbeatable, among the best Teton Valley has to offer! Features include wood and tile floors, in floor heat, extensive custom cabinets throughout the home, 1st floor master bedroom, all one floor living and an oversized 2 car garage. Beautiful low maintenance gardens and natural landscaping compliment the exterior decks and covered porches. Paved driveway was resurfaced in 2021. Expansive and inviting front walk and porch welcome your friends and guests. Privacy and Teton view to die for, heavenly!

Public Remarks: Located in the Ski Hill Road Corridor and en route to the Ski Resort, this custom built and recently constructed home has an endless list of high end finishes and amenities throughout. 9' ceilings everywhere except for the great room, which has a cathedral ceiling. Wood burning stone fireplace, capable of heating 2,500 sq. ft. Knotty Alder trim/doors and clad casement windows throughout the home. Limestone tile in front entryway and mud room. Heated limestone tile floors, granite countertops and top end fixtures in all bathrooms. Granite countertops in kitchen and all appliances are Kitchenaid's top of the line, plus a Wolf Range with Stainless Vent Hood. All interior walls are sound insulated. 2 Large, Central American Colonial chandeliers in kitchen and great room.
Private Remarks: A 60 day leaseback from day of closing with existing tenant will be required.  All rents and deposits will be transferred to buyer at closing.  48 Hour notice to show and masks required.

Exclusions: Tenant's furnishings, washer, dryer and personal property.
48 hour notice to tenant required.  Contact listing agent to schedule showings. Mask Required.

Public Remarks: Location is everything with this charming, turn-key home sitting on a fully-fenced 0.58 acre lot with mature trees and landscaping.  Nestled in the quiet neighborhood of Aspen Meadows, right off of Ski Hill Road, you can get from your front door to the Grand Targhee slopes in 15 minutes!  Enjoy a short walk or bike ride to downtown Driggs for shopping and restaurants.  After a day of adventures,  choose from either the second floor balcony, or the back patio oasis to relax and take in the beautiful Teton Range views.  There is also a heated, 120 sqft finished storage shed that was once used as an office.
Private Remarks: Lot 1 of Lower Aspen Meadows Subdivision.    Second bedroom upstairs is a loft.    Zoned ADR 0.5 - Development shall be limited to one dwelling unit for each 0.5 acre (Complete zoning regulations are in documents).  All furnishing included in sale with the exception of some owner's personal belongings (see exclusions).  Fiber is to the home, just need to be connected.
Legal Description: Lot 1 of Lower Aspen Meadows Subdivision, Teton County, Idaho, as the same appears on the official plat thereof recorded June 27, 2005, as Instrument No. 168949.
Exclusions: (2) end table in upstairs loft.  All artwork (framed or not) as well as all wall and cupboard/display decorations.

Public Remarks: Come enjoy Teton Valley at its very best with this gorgeous freestanding townhome in Teton Creek Resort. Located a few minutes from Driggs and just off Skill Hill Rd near the Wyoming state line, this beautiful property has a stunning Grand Teton views and easy access to some of the world's best mountain living. Fully furnished and at nearly 1400 sq. ft. with cozy living and dining spaces and two bedrooms complete with en-suites, deck access, and Teton views, this home is an ideal getaway for yourself or as an income property (short-term rentals are allowed). In the open concept living, dining, and kitchen area find high ceilings, plenty of natural light, beautiful views, and a propane fireplace to keep you warm on snowy winter nights.
Private Remarks: Radon System installed and functional.

Public Remarks: Stunning Teton views from the front porch and sunsets over the Big Hole mountains -- an ideal start and finish to the day in this quintessential Teton Valley home just north of Driggs, ID. The home sits on 3 acres with both privacy and serenity. Three bedrooms, two and a half baths and just over 2400 sf make this property perfect for a full-time residence as well as an investment property. This property boasts a strong rental history with convenient access for owners and guests to skiing, fishing, hiking and all that Teton Valley offers. The home is only minutes from the Driggs airport, 45 minutes from Jackson Hole and 1 hour from the Jackson Hole airport. Full-time residence, seasonal retreat or vacation rental property -- you decide!

Public Remarks: No showings until 3/1.  This pristine and turn key unit is one side of a twin home in the well located Shoshoni Plains subdivision.  The community features easy access to Ski Hill Rd., newer, high quality homes, paved roads, sidewalks, hiking and biking pathways, parks, and proximity to the town of Driggs, Grand Targhee, and schools.  The neighborhood allows vacation rentals and the unit is an established vacation rental that is being sold fully furnished for maximum convenience.  Soak in the brand new hot tub or relax in front of the fireplace after a day of recreation in the Tetons.  The lower level has mountain views and the mountain views are even more striking from the living area and bedrooms on the 2nd level.  City of Driggs plows the streets and the HOA fees are just $50/year.

Public Remarks: Enjoy convenience and comfort in this bright & sunny, furnished 2 bedroom, 2.5 bathroom single family home with oversized 1-car garage off Ski Hill Road. Well-suited as a residence or short-term rental, this house features an open floor plan kitchen, living, & dining area, and 2 private bedrooms with full ensuite bathrooms. A screened-in porch provides additional living space and a propane fireplace makes the vaulted family room a cozy place to gather during snowy months. A half bath for guests, laundry off the garage, upgraded cabinetry & custom built-ins add to the appeal. Reasonable HOA dues include trash, snow removal of driveway, front walk, & porch and maintain ponds, creek, walking bridges & trail & beautifully landscaped open space. Minutes from Grand Targhee and Driggs, Idaho.
Private Remarks: Seller Concessions were listed because the home was sold with its original furnishings valued at no more than $5000 included in the sale.
