Public Remarks: New construction twin-home in Shoshoni Plains set for completion in the spring of 2022. This well thought out plan offers 5 bedrooms with finishes including LG stainless appliances, alder cabinetry, quartz countertops, Moen plumbing fixtures, durable LVP flooring and Andersen windows all wrapped up into a tasteful modern style. One of only a few twin-home builds that does not have a shared wall between any of the interior square footage offering zero shared-wall noise between homes. Connected only at the garage. Enjoy proximity to parks, schools, downtown Driggs, restaurants and Grand Targhee from this location in a well-established neighborhood. This home can be used as a short-term rental or can be occupied full-time. Landscaping and sprinkler system are included.

Public Remarks: Quaint log home with rock fireplace/woodstove just off Ski Hill road on a roomy 1.4 acres with trees and and a firepit. This quintessential Teton Valley home allows short term rentals; very light CCR's/ low HOA dues and is sold furnished. Soaring T & G wood ceilings, cathedral windows  & lots of great sunlight, create a cozy vibe. Boasting a main bedroom in the loft with full bath (updated bathroom vanities and floors), plus 2 more bedrooms on the main level, this abode also has a bonus room on the lower level which could double as bunk room/ den or 4th bedroom. The kitchen has an island; the great room is open & airy. Two car garage with a paved driveway, and wonderful wrap around decks complete the package. Take the shuttle to Grand Targhee  Resort or ride your bike to downtown.

Sellers are in the process of some minor repairs- property has had long term tenants. Sellers are offering a $5000 credit/ allowance for kitchen countertop replacement.  Newer carpet and interior paint is complete

Public Remarks: Check out this beautifully crafted in-town home bursting with Mature trees and pollinator-friendly flower gardens. South-facing orientation adjacent to large open acreage helps entice moose, deer and amazing bird life to your back door. Free-flowing and functional floor plan both upstairs and down.  Walk-out basement creates separate entrance and easy conversion to an apartment for extra income.Gorgeous recently refinished hardwood flooring, and solid wood doors and trim throughout the home. Less than a mile to the amenities and shopping of downtown Driggs.Home has fiber optic making work from home a breeze. Walking distance to schools. Large windows are plentiful flooding the home with natural light all year round. Set up a viewing today! Seller may request a lease-back for up to 30 days.
Private Remarks: Video available via email upon request. Seller may request a lease-back for up to 30 days.  One of the lower-level bedrooms does not have a closet.  There is plenty of space to add one.

Public Remarks: New Construction. Mountain modern home in Dry Creek Ranches with 4 bedrooms and 4 bathrooms sits on 3 acres. It is within minutes of downtown Driggs and a few miles to Grand Targhee Resort. This well thought-out floorplan is one story with comfortable hydronic heating throughout. Three of the bedrooms are en-suite. Additional office/bedroom has an attic for additional storage. Gather in the living room with 20-ft ceilings or watch a movie from the entertainment room. The finishes in this house include white oak flooring, stone, woods accents, steel beams, and neutral, clean colors. The finishes enhance the modern style of the house and add warmth to embrace a mountain feel.  Get under contract now to select final finishes and personalize the house to your taste. Estimated completion in Sep

Downstairs, enjoy open living in the sleek kitchen and bright living space complete with a stove for keeping warm during those Idaho winters and a cathedral ceiling for soaking up the Valley summer sun. Upstairs, a bonus loft area adds an extra versatile space to suit your needs. There's gorgeous, established landscaping both out front and in the abundant, private backyard. And finally, with the oversized driveway and attached one-car garage, you know you'll have space for all your mountain gear. Own a piece of an enviable neighborhood with walking paths a park in Creekside!

The home has been immaculately maintained and was updated in 2015.  Oak hardwood floors, granite tops, Bosch kitchen appliances, and a cozy gas fireplace lend a quality feel to the interior. Public Remarks: Stunning, unique, and secluded property in Horseshoe Canyon with a modern log home and historic cabins. Once in a lifetime opportunity to own a historic Teton Valley property. Horseshoe Creek runs through the front of the 2 acres at the base of the Big Hole mountians. Main log home features a large bedroom, full kitchen, 3/4 bathroom, and loft area. Two additional log cabins contain single bedrooms. A forth log cabin contains a kitchen, 3/4 bathroom, and laundry. All cabins have been meticulously maintained. Fish the creek or Teton River. Mountain bike from home to nearby trailheads. Downtown Driggs is a 12 minute drive, Grand Targhee Resort, 30 minutes, Jackson Hole, 50 minutes. Enjoy all that Teton Valley has to offer from this special, one of a kind property. Year round access.
Private Remarks: No showings until July 13.  Shown by appointment only with 24 hours notice.

Public Remarks: Looking for a slice of heaven in the heart of Teton Valley? This practically new compact ultra modern home is your window to the outdoors giving you access right now to everything you wish to do. Be on the lift at Grand Targhee Resort or floating down the Teton River in 15 minutes. Go biking at Teton Canyon, snowmobiling near Aspen Trailhead, take a leisurely walk on the Teton Creek Corridor or even a round of golf, all within minutes from home. And when it's time to rest, sit back on 2.65 acres and enjoy the mountain views, beautiful skies and watch the elk roam by. In addition to this home's sleek dcor and high-end finishes you have all the space needed to enjoy the freedom at your door with multiple storage buildings and a massive 24'x40' heated shop. Start your adventure today!

Public Remarks: Come see this spacious, light-filled single family home on the edge of Driggs, just a short distance to downtown and Grand Targhee. The open floor plan with a large front entry room highlights the wood floors and vaulted ceilings of the main living area that leads to the kitchen, featuring granite counter tops and well-appointed appliances. Adjacent open space provides expansive views to the east from the private back deck, and the spacious front deck provides wonderful views to the west. Three bedrooms are located on the main floor, including the primary bedroom. The downstairs has one additional bedroom with multiple bonus rooms as well as great storage. The generous laundry room with utility sink is conveniently located off of the kitchen leading to the extra large two car garage.

Public Remarks: You need to see this view and this house.  Located in the coveted Teewinot Subdivision this home comes with (at no extra charge) unobstructed view of the Tetons.  Priced to sell, this house will make a great home or a great investment.  Short-term rentals are allowed and the home comes fully furnished.  The home is east/west facing with a large bank of windows to enjoy the view from the inside and a rather large deck to enjoy the view from the outside on those cool evenings.  Sunrises over the Tetons also come at no extra charge.  The grounds are nicely maintained with large trees to shield you from the neighbors to the north and south.  Don't miss out on this one, it's a rare opportunity to buy a house in the Teewinot subdivision.

Public Remarks: Enjoy the convenience of in-town living with easy access to Downtown Driggs; but imagine - room enough to store all the toys you need to live the mountain life. This 3 bedroom, 2 bath home checks all the boxes! Brand new, single level floor plan that's ideally suited for entertaining (inside or outside) with a large, open living and kitchen area and enormous patio. The spacious primary bedroom offers plenty of privacy, a Grand Teton view and a luxurious bath, complete with dual shower-heads, a freestanding tub, and oversize closet. The large laundry room offers plenty of space for storage, but you won't need it because that nearly 1,300 Sq Ft garage is the real star of the show. With an extra long bay allowing for pull through access, this is the perfect hub for the mountain recreator!

Public Remarks: Beautiful 3 bedroom / 2 bath ranch style log home on .5 acres with 2 bed / 1 bath basement apartment with a separate entrance. This home has an open concept living area for the kitchen, dining and living space and beautiful views of a hay  meadow from the backyard.  The large master bedroom has an updated bathroom and walk-in closet. The basement apartment is brand new and would make a welcoming guest apartment for family and friends or it could continue to be used for a long term rental apartment. Short term rentals are not permitted per the HOA. The home has a abundance of upgrades in the kitchen and bathrooms. The fenced backyard is very private and has ample room for outdoor enjoyment. It also has a shed and a greenhouse. This is a wonderful home in a great community.
Private Remarks: Per HOA, no STRs allowed. Long term tenant in the downstairs apartment. Lease expires on 5/1/23. Rent is $1800 per month.  Appliances in the apartment are also included in the sale of the home. They are: refrigerator/freezer, range, microwave. King size bed in the master bedroom is also for sale separately. Fee for community water is $70/month. It is not metered. Water softener not hooked up.

Public Remarks: Conveniently located a short bike ride to the schools, downtown Driggs and the Targhee shuttle, this 2-story home is well laid-out with a generous main level primary suite with a steam shower & soaking tub, 3 additional bedrooms, 2 family rooms and a finished extra deep 2-car garage. A 2-sided propane fireplace separates the main level living room from the spacious kitchen & dining area. The kitchen showcases stainless steel appliances, a pantry, a large granite island with seating & access to the back deck for grilling. Numerous upgrades include gorgeous Brazilian Cherry hardwood floors, travertine tile, new windows, central vac. & forced-air with AC. The private backyard is fully fenced with mature landscaping & a covered deck for entertaining. Short-term rentals allowed.

Public Remarks: This 2,173 square-foot craftsman style home is sited on a spacious 1.59-acre building site, at the foot of the Tetons, with superb Grand Teton views and features cathedral ceilings, open living area, 2-bedrooms, 3-bathrooms and a loft that is perfect for a home office, tv room and overflow sleeping. Both the great room and main floor primary bedroom suite face east and floor to ceiling windows provide unobstructed Grand Teton views and abundant natural light. The second bedroom and bathroom are located on the main level as well and include a hallway pocket door that can be closed to create a junior suite for additional privacy. The home offers beautiful landscaping, mature trees and raised garden beds, that can be enjoyed from a covered east facing deck.

Public Remarks: Charming traditional mountain 5 bedroom and 3 baths home, located off Ski Hill Road and 20 mins to Grand Targhee. The chalet-style home boasts soaring 22 ft vaulted ceilings in the main living space with 22ft high rock fireplace. There is stunning granite in the kitchen, new paint and new carpet. The house has 2 en-suite bedrooms on the bottom floor, and 3 bedrooms and 1 bath on the upper floor. An extra grand bonus room is located on the 2nd floor overseeing the first floor. Enjoy beautiful all-around mountain views, including a peek-a-boo view of The Grand Teton. The deck is ample enough for grilling and entertainment, the maintained yard has mature trees providing privacy, and a firepit with benches for campfires.  ST rentals are allowed; the house is currently a high-revenue rental.
Private Remarks: Furnishing are negotiable with the exception of the table and some decorations.

Public Remarks: Currently the most affordable single family home on market in Driggs. Located 2 blocks from Main Street in Driggs, this ''fixer upper'' home and lot are zoned Mixed Use (NX), which allows for a variety of uses from commercial and multi family residential to single family residential. The home has 3 bedrooms, Office/Nursery, 2 bathrooms,  and a detached 2 car garage. The home & property are currently being used as a daycare facility and the existing lease is month to month with 60 days notice required for tenant to vacate, from date of closing. House and property showings are limited to Monday-Friday after 6:00pm or anytime on weekends.

Public Remarks: This exquisite modern home in Driggs is well thought out, crafted beautifully and has a ready to rent studio apartment! The home is a 2 bedroom 1 bathroom on the main floor and a 1 bedroom 1 bathroom apartment with a separate entrance above, perfect for short or long-term rentals. With all exposed siding being metal, and a metal roof, there is little to no exterior maintenance. The interior boasts high quality craftsmenship with custom reclaimed redwood trim throughout the home and bespoke redwood kitchen cabinets in the upstairs apartment. This home has both electric cove heat and a small wood-stove along with in floor heat in the kitchen, bathroom and apartment. Being in Driggs means no CCR's or HOA and a lot more freedom with your property and a very short walk or bike to all of Driggs.

Public Remarks: A quiet location at the end of a cul de sac, this well maintained home with rustic accents throughout. A classic mountain retreat dcor home. The open floor plan is warm and inviting, with a spacious kitchen, vaulted ceilings and a wood stove. Features such as rough sawn fir hardwood floors, nicely finished barn wood and hickory cabinets and trim. A spacious south facing deck with trellis beam work option to add sunshades. Paved driveway, 2-car garage, a large lean two for ample toy storage, wood shed shelter, a covered front porch with Grand Targhee Mountain Resort view. Fully fenced back yard, auto sprinkler. No CCR's & HOA dues.

Public Remarks: Just north of Driggs, this custom home situated on 1.38 acres in Saddlehorn Ranch offers the Teton views this valley is known for! While the views are incredible, so is this bright and inviting home with an open floor plan and vaulted great room. The kitchen is tastefully designed with a butcher block island made from reclaimed bowling alley planks, two ovens, a sink with a window overlooking the mountains and a corner pantry. The primary bedroom and guest bedroom are on the main level with two more bedrooms downstairs as well as a flex space and a large additional living area. Insulated concrete forms were used in the basement which drastically decrease energy costs. Enjoy the massive back yard with a fire pit, large patio and tons of space to spread out and take it all in.

Public Remarks: New construction home in Shoshoni Plains that is move-in ready. This well thought out twin-home plan is only connected at the garage, offering more privacy, light and separation than traditional twin-homes. This 5 bedroom/3 bath home includes LG stainless appliances, alder cabinetry, quartz countertops, durable LVP flooring, air conditioning and Andersen windows all wrapped up into a tasteful modern style. The open concept living, kitchen and dining area is great for entertaining. Enjoy proximity to parks, schools, downtown Driggs, restaurants and Grand Targhee from this location in a well-established neighborhood. This home can be used as a short-term rental or can be occupied full-time. Landscaping and sprinkler system are included.

Public Remarks: This custom high efficiency home located just 2.5 miles North of Driggs is also near one of the preferred throughways to Grand Targhee resort. Outside, low maintenance siding and large rough sawn timbers carry the covered front and rear decks. Step inside to find a vaulted living area with a cozy wood burning fireplace that is also tied into the forced air heating system. Along with 2 guest bedrooms, the master is on the main floor and includes a large walk-in closet and custom bath. A bonus room over the garage with alcove storage, and basement complete with two bedrooms, full bath, living, tons of storage and a media room is complemented by a large over sized garage. The home is offered furnished and is currently a successful vacation rental managed by Teton Valley Property Management.

Public Remarks: Set on over 5 beautifully landscaped and irrigated acres, this custom craftsman Earthship inspired home is HOA and CCR free. The Tuscan artisanal design features unique amenities uncommon in modern conventional builds. The open living/ kitchen/ dining plan with abundant south facing windows blends seamlessly with the surrounding perennial garden beds and lovingly cultivated aspens and evergreens. The pond and terraced fire-pit create the ultimate peaceful and secluded sanctuary. Graze your animals on 2 fenced irrigated acres. Property features radiant floor heating, root cellar, a wood-burning sauna, a 24' plumbed yurt, and a modern 950 sq ft. insulated heated shop. Centrally located in Teton Valley, world class skiing at Grand Targhee is only 20 mins away and Driggs an easy 5 min drive.
Private Remarks: Home is owner occupied. Showings begin Friday, July 14th. Please give appropriate notice - a minimum of 24 hours and preferably two days.    There are several outdoor metal art sculptures. Three are permanent installations. Most are not included in the sale & negotiable.    Yurt is currently rented by a long-term tenant. Short term rentals are permitted.    Seller prefers leaseback through Sept.

Enjoy walking to restaurants, shopping, etc. This home would make a wonderful full-time residence or Short-term rental.

Public Remarks: Wake up to sweeping views of the Tetons every morning in this well-built home in excellent condition. This home has a fantastic location-2 miles south of Driggs and a jaunt over the pass to Jackson. The home includes a 524 sq ft studio apartment with a separate external entrance, great for a mother-in-law suite or short term rentals. No CCRS, daylight walkout lower level, extensive irrigated landscaping, and open space living. 4 bedrooms, 4 baths, office, den, dining room sitting room, game room, oversize garage, freshly paved driveway, exterior parking, the list goes on! Two propane fireplaces, hickory flooring, newly painted rooms, lots of storage. Established farmland on 2 sizes with perfect mountain views. Plus with wood-appearance steel siding you will enjoy having no exterior maint.

Public Remarks: This superb, impeccably maintained, furnished home is turn-key & versatile!  The quality of this home shines inside & out.  The thoughtfully designed stamped concrete & paver patios are perfect for a summer spent outdoors.  Soak in the hot tub & take in the Teton views after a day of recreating.  Just a few quick minutes from the charming town of Driggs & 20 minutes from Grand Targhee, Shoshoni Plains is a newer neighborhood with quality construction & city maintained paved roads & parks. Public Remarks: Located in the coveted Redtail development, this premium location offers paved roads, fiber internet speeds, open space wildlife corridors and privacy while maintaining convenient access to both downtown Driggs and Grand Targhee Resort. The fully landscaped home features high quality windows, a blend of stone and large timbers as well as a synthetic shake roof, all contributing to the extraordinary curb appeal to this custom home. Public Remarks: Now listed on 10 acres! Not in an HOA, this home offers a canvas for a legacy property, or an amazing opportunity for one looking to call Teton Valley, home. Public Remarks: Fall in love with this charming farmhouse style 3 bedroom home on a corner lot in Creekside Meadows on the southside of Driggs, Idaho. Whether you work from home, are purchasing your first home, are looking for a vacation home, a short or long term rental property, a retirement home, or employee housing, this property is perfect. Wonderfully simple single level floorplan with spacious bedrooms, abundant closets and attached garage. Thoughtful features include maple cabinets, a wood stove, an open concept floorplan, and wood laminate and tile flooring. Recent upgrades include interior repainting, new stainless steel appliances and new hot water heater all within the last year. The front porch provides a perfect spot for morning coffee and relaxation. Pathways begin here to downtown Driggs.

Public Remarks: This 5 bedroom/3 bath home just south of Driggs on 1 acre with a fenced yard and no HOA is perfect for value-oriented buyers. Fully furnished, it lives comfortably with hardwood floors, granite countertops, a cozy propane fireplace and a functional floor plan. The kitchen opens up to the dining area off the family room with sliding glass doors out to the back deck. The primary suite enjoys a spacious bathroom & private deck. 2 additional guest bedrooms & bathroom and designated laundry room off the 800 sq.ft garage complete the main level. Downstairs is a 2nd family room, workout area, 2 more bedrooms and a 3rd bathroom. The oversized garage & detached shed provide ample storage for toys & tools. Fully landscaped with patio & RV pad, schedule a time to see all this property has to offer!

Public Remarks: Beautifully crafted 2022 built 4-5 bedroom, 4 bath Driggs home; charming little city park to the east yields view protection & buffer. Makes a great primary home, 2nd home, or investment property. A short walk or bike ride into town or to schools, the location is fantastic. Boasts wood floors, handsome floor to ceiling stone fireplace, solid alder doors and trim, stone counters, custom tile work; a finely crafted home, built with care. Clean modern finish, expansive, sun filled  windows, quality lighting, insulated blinds, stainless appliances, a great design. Lovely landscaping, private back yard abuts open park, providing a private setting, with a organically protected view of the Teton range. Optimizing your investment or second home via short term rental is permitted in this location.

Public Remarks: Enjoy huge Teton views from this move-in ready 3 bedroom/2 bath Swedish cope log home. Located just north of Driggs in Saddlehorn Ranch, an established neighborhood with laid-back CCRs that allow short-term rentals. A beautifully updated kitchen with quartz tops & new floors in 2020 add to the appeal of an open floor plan with wood-burning stove, 2nd family room in the walk-out basement and oversized detached garage with room for a workbench or home gym. An auto sprinkler system keeps the yard green and the garden shed & lean-to provide additional storage, while the wrap-around deck maximizes outdoor living space to enjoy sunrises over the Tetons & Big Hole sunsets from the back deck. Convenient to Targhee & town, this is the perfect home base for skiing, biking & fishing in Teton Valley.
Private Remarks: There is a shared well agreement with the property to the north. Lot 4 to the east across Wildcat which could also be available for purchase.    Most of the furniture is negotiable

Public Remarks: This is the perfect Teton Valley ski cabin with the good bones!  A custom-built log cabin in the coveted subdivision of Targhee Ranch. Outside you will find beautiful outdoor living spaces including a large deck, a functioning green house, mature landscaping, two car detached garage and a wood heated rustic shed. On the inside it is easy to enjoy the thoughtful use of space in the open concept living room/kitchen, a main floor master and guest room. The open staircase reveals a large loft area offering additional family living space, another bedroom and full bathroom.  On almost a full acre just minutes away from Grand Targhee Ski Resort this home is ready the serve the next outdoor enthusiast.  Make an appointment soon to see this special property, it won't last long!

Public Remarks: Easy and affordable to maintain, this is the furnished Driggs townhouse you have been waiting for! This laid-back community offers walking paths to downtown and city services with HOA dues at only $50 per year! Fully landscaped, one of the very few townhouse communities with privacy fences and room to expand into your very own outdoor living space. Inside, the main floor of this extraordinarily well maintained home includes fresh hardwood, main floor primary with enormous walk-in closet and private East facing deck, ample living spaces and a second grilling area. Downstairs, the custom fully finished basement features a kitchenette, second gas fireplace in the lower living area, and three additional bedrooms. Located near the airport and just a 10 minute drive from town, this spacious and modern home is perfect for those who want to be close to everything while still enjoying the serenity of nature. With an oversized garage, you'll have plenty of room to store all of your gear and toys for your next adventure. With views of the tetons, along with an oversized deck, you can enjoy the stunning views of the surrounding mountains & landscapes from the comfort of your own home. Public Remarks: Just minutes from the heart of downtown Driggs, this townhouse offers the perfect blend of comfort, style, and convenience. With 3 expansive floors including a finished basement, there's room for everyone. The main floor boasts a large living room with gas fireplace, well-appointed kitchen, cozy dining nook and access to the two-car garage. The basement features a full bath and 2 guest areas, ideal for hosting or additional space. Upstairs, you'll find 2 guest bedrooms, a full bath, and a luxurious primary suite with dual closets. Newly updated with fresh flooring and impeccably maintained, this end-unit offers a massive side and rear yard and even a nearby peekaboo view of the iconic Grand Teton. Don't miss this incredible opportunity to live or invest in one of the best spots in Driggs!
